Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputable multinational ITES company that has been operating for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates who are willing to work night shifts. Male candidates are encouraged to apply for the available positions. FCBL provides an excellent workplace located in the heart of Banani for male staff.

Job Responsibilities:
- Executing daily voice operations and generating high-quality warm leads through outbound telemarketing campaigns.
- Operating specialized North American real estate management initiatives, focusing on portfolio onboarding and management.
- Reviewing daily performance reports to identify discrepancies, revenue leakages, and operational errors for higher management.
- Liaising with probationary personnel to identify performance obstacles and facilitate cultural integration.
- Identifying and resolving interpersonal or departmental conflicts and providing strategic recommendations.
- Researching psychological motivation and emotional triggers to develop engagement methodologies for diverse team environments.
- Performing internal audits to mitigate opportunity loss and uphold superior standards for stakeholder collaboration.

Employment Status: Full-time
Job Location: Dhaka

Compensation & Other Benefits:
- On-time salary
- Monthly and yearly recreation based on performance
- Unlimited NESCAF√â
- Yearly 10 paid holidays and 15 casual paid leaves
- Loan facilities for all employees, including probationary employees
- 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital for employees, their parents, spouses, and children
- Company-sponsored 3 annual programs

Read Before Apply:
Visit https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction about yourself in English. Save the audio file and send it as an attachment along with your resume to apply@futurecloudbd.com. The voice recording is to verify fluency in English, so do your best in the audio recording.

Requirements: Educational Requirements

- Fresh graduates and last-semester students can apply.
- Educational requirements can be relaxed if there is over 1 year of experience in a BPO/international call center.
- Minimum 1 Year experience.

Responsibilities: A 100% export oriented Wig Manufacturing factory is looking for dynamic & highly motivated professional to fill up the following position:

- Supervise and manage production floor technical operations.
- Ensure product quality meets export standards.
- Troubleshoot technical issues in manufacturing processes.
- Coordinate with management and production teams.
- Maintain safety, efficiency, and compliance standards.
- Train and guide junior technical staff when required.

Requirements: If you feel you are the right person for this position, please apply within 07 (Seven) days from the published date with a detailed CV, telephone number, and a recent passport size color photograph to the following address:

Trillion Gold Ltd.
Fatehjangpur, Chirirbandor, Dinajpur, Bangladesh.

Experience Requirements:
- 3-4 years of practical experience in the related field (Wig / Hair Processing / Manufacturing / Technical Operations preferred).
- Strong technical knowledge in factory production processes.

Additional Requirements:
- Excellent communication skills.
- Must be fluent in Chinese or English (both spoken and written).
- Strong leadership and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to work under pressure and manage production efficiency.
- Citizens of any country are eligible to apply.
